content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the stone furnace entity which was used for smelting iron ore into iron plates. The furnace received coal as fuel and iron ore as input to produce iron plates, and later allowed extraction of the resulting iron plates.

### Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the wooden chest entity placed to store items. Its placement on the map at (2.5, 2.5) supports inventory management during operations.

ERROR TIPS
• No errors have been encountered in the current execution steps.
